オプション1: Star Man and the others improvised a stretcher with rope and wooden poles.
"Come to think of it... before coming here, I met Vim at See Poroporo."
said Star Man.
"Oh."
"VSCO—the attacking white person—was killed by that man earlier."
"...I see."
"Triangle Man. Earlier you said you wanted payback on that violent guy, right?"
said Trapezoid Man.

"Bad people fight bad people,
so we can just watch from a distance."

"We don't need to fight. The truly bad ones will fight each other.
We should think about escape."
"...Got it."
Square Man and Triangle Man lifted the stretcher.
"It's heavy... but we can carry it."
"We'll switch off. Slowly, little by little, inch by inch—we'll get there."

"We'll move our things to another room too.
The plan is to withdraw from this place once."
"Okay."
"We'll come back when things have calmed down."
"Yeah."
Star Man began gathering their belongings and putting them in baskets.

"Those will come in handy.
We can keep making more whenever we want."
said Trapezoid Man.
Star Man nodded slightly.
"You remember how to make them?"
"Yeah. Probably (laughs)."
"Okay."

"Know‑how stays in your head. There's a saying,
'You can steal property, but you can't steal knowledge.' You know it?"
Trapezoid Man said with a smug look.
"Huh."
The four headed into the forest.
[With Trapezoid Man on the stretcher, head for the Coastal Cave.]

[In Stretcher Mode, you can't jump or attack.]
[If you enter rivers or the sea in Stretcher Mode, everyone's stamina will be drained massively.]

[Normally, using "Rest 3 Hours" lowers NPC status,
 but during Stretcher Mode, using "Rest 3 Hours" restores NPC status.]

[If an NPC dies, Stretcher Mode ends,
 and surviving NPCs remain where they are.]
[If an NPC dies underwater, all other NPCs also die.]
[If Star Man dies during Stretcher Mode, all NPCs die as well.]
